name: Classic White Christmas Lights
detail: When it doubt, go with a classic. White outdoor Christmas lights keep it simple, and allow you to add a mix of other playful decorations to your lawn (if you want to!).

name: Traditional Multi Color String Lights
detail: Looking for the traditional colored Christmas lights you grew up with? These are a close match, and good for indoor/outdoor use.

name: Old-Fashioned - LED String Lights
detail: C6-style bulbs bring a dose of nostalgia to your display, but an LED version consumes a lot less energy and gives off less heat. Your electricity bill will thank you

name: Classic Icicle Lights
detail: This holiday standby gives you so much more dazzle than a single strand. Consider it an essential part of any serious decorators arsenal.

name: Mini Globe Multi Color LED Lights
detail: These lights — which come in colors, plus white and warm white — have a wireless smart control feature that lets you change the flashing pattern, timers, and brightness via an app.

name: Twinkle String Christmas Lights
detail: These almost look like those old-fashioned Christmas lights, but this string has the power to twinkle, flash, and show six other light modes.

name: LED Multicolor Ball Lights
detail: This battery-operated option goes wherever you want it to go — no extension cords required.

name: Outdoor Solar Garden Lights
detail: These solar-powered lights will add even more holiday sparkle to your outdoor Christmas decorations. Plus, its a versatile design so you can use them year-round.

name: LED Snowflake Projector Light
detail: Decorate your home in a flash with this projector, which creates the effect of falling snow in or outside your home. You have all the power to change up the lights and color scheme with a remote control.

name: Garden Laser Light With Remote Control
detail: No ladders, no hassle — just point this single laser light toward your homes facade and you get thousands of red and green twinkles in an instant.
